Reviews.Title: NOT NEW and NOT UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: Ashley Strimbu
Reviews.Content: Received this phone yesterday and am disappointed that the description lied about the phone. It said it was an unlocked GSM device. It's NOT. It's locked into AT&T.; It says it was a new device not a used device, also not true. The charging block is chipped and the plastic screen protector that comes on ALL NEW PHONES, had clearly been pulled off and replaced on the phone to give a "New Look"...Will be calling Amazon later today to see what they have to say about the misleading information that was provided.Other than the misleading information about the phone, I am pleased with the phone and how quickly it responds.** The seller of this phone contacted me, and explained amazon sends the phones out, and they sent the wrong phone.** But even with the seller attempt to make things right, which I really appreciated, this phone is constantly disconnecting from the network, and I am returning it.

Reviews.Title: HTC Vivid from Driven Wireless
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: The HTC Vivid that came from Driven Wireless was in great condition.  I thought it would have some minor scratches or scuffs, but I can't see anything on it.  It's pretty much perfect.  I bought this phone to set it up with straight talk and it works great.  Very easy to set up.  The only problems I have with the phone is that there is some minor glitches while operating sometimes the phone would go into dock mode, and the only way to get out of it was to turn it off and back on.  However it was really easy to disable the dock mode through the settings and I haven't had any more problems with it doing that.  Also when i place a call the phone automatically goes into speaker mode, but i don't mind easy enough to just hit the button and turn that off as well.  Another problem is when turning it off the phone always comes back on, on the car mode dash screen another easy fix just turn that off.  I looked these problems on the internet and it seems to be common with the phone.  But like I said they are easy to get around these bugs.  Overall the phone works awesomely and I couldn't be happier buying a used phone with this company.  My spouse was even jealous when she saw the condition of the phone and when I told her about the minor bugs she still didn't hesitate on buying a one for herself because they were easy fixes.

ProductInfo.Features:
The HTC Vivid is a feature-packed Android smartphone with super-fast 4G LTE data speed, and a gorgeous 4.5-inch SuperLCD display
Other features include 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, 16 GB internal storage, 8 megapixel camera with 1080p HD video recording, and front-facing camera
The Vivid also features WiFi, multi-format music player, HTC Sense software, mobile hotspot, microSD memory card slot, and GPS navigation
This device is equipped with quad-band GSM and WCDMA modes for international use - GSM 850/900/1800/1900 - LTE 700/1700 - WCDMA 850/1900/2100
Use this Android smartphone to access thousands of apps, games, books, movies, and music on Google's Play Store
